thank you for 1K ☺️ we truly appreciate each and everyone of you who have joined us and supported us every friday night and here’s to a big announcement and achievement! We have revamped our brand logo, designed by @lynnsayscrystals !!!

our logo idea:
i told lynn that i want something abstract and minimalist, something that represent us, something that could show that kayla.crystals is not just kayla but also an admin behind managing all the saikang while i had a hard time juggling my full-time job because we are a team and i couldn’t have gone so far without his help. 

and tadahhhh she gave me a perfect logo, exactly what’s in my mind when i told her my idea!!!! 

here’s a shout out to @lynnsayscrystals !! hit her up to find out her rates if you are looking to design a logo!!! she’s TALENTED AND AMAZING!!! thank you lynn, i love it so much!!!💗
